page.title: 03SCHOOLS NEAR COED EVA
page.content: THERE ARE THREE PRIMARY SCHOOLS AND ONE SECONDARY SCHOOL WITHIN OUR AREA. COED EVA INFANTS SCHOOL AND COED EVA JUNIOR SCHOOL SHARE THE SAME CAMPUS AND WERE BOTH OPENED IN 1968. THEY ARE OF MODERN DESIGN, CONSISTING MAINLY OF PREFABRICATED MATERIALS AND GLASS. BOTH ARE MIXED SCHOOLS, THE FORMER CATERING FOR 4-7 YEAR OLDS AND THE LATER FOR 7-11 YEAR OLDS. THE NUMBER OF PUPILS IN THESE SCHOOLS IS DECLINING. THE INFANTS SCHOOL HAS 276 PUPILS AND TEN TEACHERS WHILE THE JUNIOR 382 PUPILS AND FOURTEEN TEACHERS. THE MAJORITY TRANSFER FROM COED EVA INFANTS TO COED EVA JUNIOR SCHOOL AND THEN TO FAIRWATER COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL. THE CURRICULUM IS VARIED, INCLUDING MATHS,ENGLISH, HISTORY, GEOGRAPHY, SCIENCE, R.E, GAMES AND ART AND CRAFT.
